task: Implement synced Swiper gallery in agent-mode template
objective: Replace the old gallery grid with a Swiper slider that includes a synced thumbnail navigation slider, just like the demo in https://codesandbox.io/p/sandbox/6j86wp?file=%2Findex.html

instructions.1: Enqueue Swiper.js and Swiper.css from CDN in the plugin or template head
instructions.2: Create two Swiper containers in the agent-mode template
instructions.3: First Swiper = main slider with large images
instructions.4: Second Swiper = thumbnail navigation below, synced with main slider
instructions.5: Use only $property_data['gallery_urls'] as source, no fallbacks to gallery_ids
instructions.6: Each image must have proper alt text using get_the_title() or post title + index
instructions.7: All CSS must be scoped under .agent-mode to avoid conflicts
instructions.8: Swiper should be initialized in agent-mode.js or inline in the footer for now
instructions.9: Ensure mobile responsive: thumbnails stack or slide horizontally
instructions.10: Add lazy loading for images except the first one

output.php: Update the agent template to render two Swiper wrappers: .swiper-main and .swiper-thumbs using gallery_urls
output.js: Add Swiper initialization script like in the CodeSandbox, using new Swiper(...)
output.css: Add scoped styles to make the sliders look clean, modern and avoid RealHomes theme conflicts

notes: The output must replicate the CodeSandbox demo exactly, but integrated into the PBCR Agent Mode HTML structure. No placeholder images or fake slides, use real gallery_urls.
